'''''They Shall Not Grow Old''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete ''[[Pay Your Respects]].''

==Trivia==
* "They shall not grow old" is the opening line of the "Ode of Remembrance". This in turn originated from {{w|For the Fallen|"For the Fallen"}}, a poem published in 1914 and written by Laurence Binyon in response to the outbreak of World War I.
